page.title: 07My Visit To The High School
page.content: Buckhaven High School is huge.It has 1600 pupils.I go there after the summer holidays.I am terrified I get lost or go to the wrong classes and get lines on my first day. We went into the lecture room,Mr Grant the Rector came in to talk to us then Mrs Rodger a guidance teacher asked us a few questions.The P.E. teacher told us we would need blue shorts and a white Tee_shirt for gym. Some prefects came in then to show us around so we were put into groups. We visited the geography,music and art classes,the language and science labs.where I was told to put my hair under my collar in case it went on fire if it touched a Bunsen burner. Some teachers sound nice others strict but as the prefects are to guide us round the first few days I think I will like it.
